form.title: АЗС НАФТАН - ведомость учета выдачи ГСМ

provider.selectSQL: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM waybillsRefuellingSheets WHERE sheetNumber=0{_sheet} AND sheetState=0) SELECT s.recordId, convert(CHAR(12), s.refuellingDate, 104) refuellingDate1, s.waybillNumber, s.garageNumber, t.model+' '+t.registrationNumber model, left(isNull(d.zex,'')+' '+ isNull(d.tab,'')+' '+ d.fio, 25) fio, s.quantity FROM waybillsRefuelling s LEFT JOIN transportFacilities t ON t.garageNumber =s.garageNumber and t.ownerId = s.ownerId LEFT JOIN drivers d ON d.driverId = s.driverId WHERE (refuellingId = 0 OR refuellingId IS NULL) AND s.sheetNumber = 0{_sheet} ORDER BY s.recordId ELSE BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM waybillsRefuellingSheets WHERE sheetNumber=0{_sheet} AND sheetState=1) SELECT NULL recordId, NULL refuellingDate1, NULL waybillNumber, 'Ведомость No '+'{_sheet}'+' закрыта' model, ' ' fio, NULL quantity ELSE SELECT NULL recordId, NULL refuellingDate1, NULL waybillNumber, 'Ведомость No '+'{_sheet}'+' не существует' model, ' ' fio, NULL quantity END
